title: Slab serif stencil font used in viction:ary book
content:
Hey everyone!

I found this book called “PALETTE 01. Black & White. New Monochrome Graphics” from viction:ary ( [http://victionary.com/product/p01-bw/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317095516/http:/victionary.com/product/p01-bw/ "http://victionary.com/product/p01-bw/")) and I loved this font they used on some quotes and all the paragraph texts which in my head looks a bit like Rockwell but an stencil version.

I've seen online a few slab serif fonts but they are not as nice as this one. Does anyone know which font is this one? I took a very bad picture at the book store and found a few more online from the book.

THANKS!

Font: 

 Stag Stencil 

Solved By: 

 [riccard0](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317095516/http:/typophile.com/user/46071 "View user profile.")
